properties.description: This is the S51 advice curated table for ODT consumption

source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_s51_advice

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT

    CAST(AD.AdviceNodeID as INT)						    AS adviceId,
    AD.AdviceReference									    AS adviceReference,
    CASE
        WHEN AD.CaseNodeID = 'None'
        THEN CAST("-1" as INT)
        ELSE AD.CaseNodeID
    END                                                     AS caseId,
    AD.CaseReference									    AS caseReference,
    AD.AdviceTitle									        AS title,
    AD.Enquirer                                             AS from,
    CASE
        WHEN LOWER(AD.EnquirerOrganisation) = 'none'
        THEN NULL
        ELSE AD.EnquirerOrganisation
    END                                                     AS agent,
    CASE 
        WHEN LOWER(AD.EnquiryMethod) = 'none'
        THEN NULL
        ELSE LOWER(AD.EnquiryMethod)
        END                                                 AS method,
    AD.EnquiryDate                                          AS enquiryDate,
    AD.Enquiry                                              AS enquiryDetails,
    AD.AdviceFrom                                           AS adviceGivenBy,
    AD.AdviceDate                                           AS adviceDate,
    AD.Advice                                               AS adviceDetails,
    CASE
        WHEN AD.AdviceStatus IN ('Not Checked','unchecked','Depublished')
        THEN "unchecked"
        WHEN AD.AdviceStatus = 'Do Not Publish'
        THEN 'donotpublish'
        ELSE LOWER(AD.AdviceStatus)
    END                                                     AS status,
    "unredacted"                                            AS redactionStatus,
    CASE
        WHEN LOWER(AD.AttachmentID) = 'none'
        THEN NULL
        ELSE AD.AttachmentID
    END                                                     AS attachmentIds

FROM odw_harmonised_db.nsip_s51_advice 	        AS AD
WHERE AD.IsActive = 'Y'

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
view_df = spark.sql('SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_s51_advice')
view_df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable('odw_curated_db.nsip_s51_advice')
